gate.relations

Class RelationSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.relations.RelationSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotationSetListener, Serializable, Iterable<Relation>, Collection<Relation>, EventListener, Set<Relation>

    public class RelationSet
extends Object
implements Serializable, AnnotationSetListener, Set<Relation>
    Utility class for managing a set of GATE relations (usually each annotation set of a document will have one set of associated relations).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ANY

        public static final int ANY
        Annotation ID used when calling getRelations(int...) for positions with no restrictions.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • indexByType

        protected Map<String,BitSet> indexByType
        Index for relations by type.

      • indexById

        protected Map<Integer,Relation> indexById
        Index for relations by id.

      • indexesByMember

        protected List<Map<Integer,BitSet>> indexesByMember
        Indexes for relations by member. Each element in the list refers to a given position in the members array: the element at position zero refers to the first member of all relations. The element at position pos is a map from annotation ID (representing a relation member) to a BitSet indicating which of the relation indexes correspond to relations that contain the given annotation (i.e. member) on the position pos.

      • annSet

        protected AnnotationSet annSet
        The AnnotationSet this set of relations relates to. The assumption (which is actively enforced) is that all members of this RelationSet will be either Annotation instances from this AnnotationSet or other Relation instances within this set.

      • listeners

        private Vector<RelationSetListener> listeners

      • maxID

        private int maxID
        The max ID of any relation within this set which is needed for some of the index access operations

      • relations

        private Relation[] relations
        Use only for serialization

      • addRelation

        public Relation addRelation(String type,
                   int... members)
                     throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new Relation and adds it to this set. Uses the default relation implementation at SimpleRelation.
        Parameters:
        type - the type for the new relation.
        members - the annotation IDs for the annotations that are members in this relation.
        Returns:
        the newly created Relation instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • get

        public Relation get(Integer id)

      • getRelations

        public Collection<Relation> getRelations(int... members)
        Finds relations based on their members.
        Parameters:
        members - an array containing annotation IDs. If a constraint is not required for a given member position, then the ANY. value should be used.
        Returns:
        all the relations that have the given annotation IDs (members) on the specified positions.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getReferencing

        public Collection<Relation> getReferencing(Integer id)
        Returns a collection of all Relation instances within this set which include the specified Annotation or Relation
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a set of all Relation instances within this set which include the specified id

      • intersection

        protected Collection<Relation> intersection(BitSet... indexLists)
        Calculates the intersection of a set of lists containing relation IDs
        Parameters:
        indexLists - the list to be intersected.
        Returns:
        the list of relations contained in all the supplied index lists.
